item.title: Research Methodology
item.description: My sincere thanks to the team of Nalanda Academy. Especial thanks to the Director Mr Anoop Kheri and the course moderators Sapana Jambhulkar and Anup Chele. Below are the links to watch the respective session on YouTube: Research Framework Session 1 Session 2 Research Approaches Session 3 Ethics in Research Session 4 Literature Review, Measurement & Sampling

item.title: Effective Citation and Referencing for Avoiding Plagiarism
